definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: But we only went in for one play, right?
sentences.chinese: 不过，我们就这么着打了一场比赛，对吧？

sentences.english: You should take aim like this.
You do that and I'm a dead duck .
sentences.chinese: 你要这么着，我就将死了。

sentences.english: Do you usually catch anything here , smack in the middle of the Aare?
sentences.chinese: 常能钓着点儿啥么，就这么着阿勒河中间来条小船？

sentences.english: Just for this reason, some capable wailers were often hired to weep at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 就这么着，一些会哭的人，就常被人家请去帮哭。

sentences.english: So, the emperor is on the march under the canopy of Wealthy up.
sentences.chinese: 这么着，皇帝就在那个富丽的华盖下游行起来了。

definition: to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
I/me/my/(often used in early vernacular literature)
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
